item.description:
This isn't your Grandma's bowl-a-thon! This unique bowl-a-thon is presented by the Creative Arts Workshop (CAW) and proceeds will benefit the Community Soup Kitchen. The public is invited to visit the pottery studio at CAW on Audobon St. in New Haven on Sunday, November 18th between 1:30-5:00 to participate.

Pick out a beautifully hand-crafted mug or bowl, filled with heart-warming soup and bread and make a donation to the Soup Kitchen. You take home the bowl/mug and the notion that you did a great service for the community!

Donation Levels:
Small items = $10
Soup Bowl/Mug = $15
Large Items = $30+

Food generously donated by Anna Liffey?s, Atticus Bookstore/Cafe, Bruegger?s Bagel Bakery, Edge of the Woods, The Whole Enchilada of New Haven, Trader Joe?s, and the chefs of the Community Soup Kitchen.

http://creativeartswo...

Contact:
Michelle R. will be there earlier in the day
Amanda O. will be there later in the day

Contact phone numbers will be emailed to Yes/Maybe respondants the day of the event.
item.name: BOWL-a-thon
